7Modules #permalink

Code snippets that come with the brink tech SMACSS package

7.1bubble #permalink

creates a sort of hovering section of delight

Examples
Default styling

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.bubble
default styling

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.bubble-round
round bubble

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
<div class='[modifier class]'> 
	<div class='glyph glyph-online-visibility'></div>
	<h3>headline</h3>
	<p>text lots of text this is text</p>
	<ul>
		<li>list item</li>
		<li>list item</li>
		<li>list item</li>
	</ul>
</div>

7.1.1@mixin bubble #permalink

  • $bubble-margin-bottom
    margin to add at the bottom of the bubble

creates a bubble of content that hovers above the page. good for placing in grids. Works best with ul. Add to child elements themselves.

7.1.2@mixin bubble-round #permalink

same as the bubble, only this time the border radius is set at 50% -> making it round. include after bubble mixin

7.2@mixin button #permalink

makes a button

Examples
Default styling
.button-cool
a cool button 
<button class='[modifier class]'>I'm some content!</button>
<button class='[modifier class]'>Click me!</button>

7.3form #permalink

styles for forms

Examples
Default styling
.form-pretty
pretty form
.test-form-sending
form that is sending
.test-form-success
form that successfully sent
.test-form-error
form that did not successfully send 
<form class="[modifier class]">
	<div class='message'></div>
	<label>Name</label>
	<input type='text' />
	<label>Phone</label>
	<input type='text' />
	<label>Details</label>
	<textarea></textarea>
	<label class='label-placeholder'></label>
	<input type='submit' />
</form>

7.3.1@mixin form-pretty #permalink

makes a normal form into a pretty form! include in form selector

7.3.2@mixin is-form-active #permalink

default styles for an active form

7.3.3@mixin is-form-error #permalink

styles a form that was unsuccessfully sent to the server

7.3.4@mixin is-form-sending #permalink

styles a frozen form that is in the process of being sent

7.3.5@mixin is-form-sent #permalink

styles a frozen form that has been successfully sent

7.4header #permalink

header modules. A header is composed of the header element which has each: children h1, x.logo, x.location

Examples
Default styling

Header

  • vancouver, bc
.is-header-collapsed
collapses on scroll

Header

  • vancouver, bc
<header class='[modifier class]'>
	<div class='logo'></div>
	<h1>Header</h1>
	<ul class='location'>
		<li> vancouver, bc</li>
	</ul>
</header>

7.4.1@mixin header #permalink

  • $logo
    description
  • $size
    description
  • $margin
    description

default setup for header. Assumes that .location has a default font-size of 1rem

7.4.2@mixin is-header-collapsed #permalink

collapses the header into a nav and header on scroll down requires javascript?

icon set by brink tech

Examples
Default styling

email icon
.glyph-gps
gps icon
.glyph-oil
oil icon

phone icon
.glyph-recruiting
recruiting icon

reputation icon

trends icon

uptime icon
.glyph-business-cards
business cards icon
.glyph-devices
devices icon
.glyph-domain
domain management icon
.glyph-graphics
graphics development icon
.glyph-hardware
hardware icon
.glyph-online-visibility
online visibility icon
.glyph-brand
brand icon
.glyph-brand.glyph-size-large
brand icon in large size 
<div class='glyph [modifier class]'></div>

7.6list #permalink

resets styles on the element back to list-specific defaults. Good for removing the cascade from mixins like 'grid', 'bubble'. Add to list items themselves.

Examples
Default styling
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.list-pretty
pretty style
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item

<ul>
  <li class="[modifier class]">list item</li>
  <li class="[modifier class]">list item</li>
  <li class="[modifier class]">list item</li>
  <li class="[modifier class]">list item</li>
  <li class="[modifier class]">list item</li>
  <li class="[modifier class] complete">list item</li>
</ul>

7.6.1@mixin list #permalink

resets element to default list item styling. apply to li

7.6.2@mixin list-pretty #permalink

includes @mixin list, but adds some nice coloring and hover effects

7.7@mixin menu #permalink

creates a menu with hidden nested lists -> hover show to display

7.8nav #permalink

nav styles

Examples
Default styling
  • Home
  • Portfolio
  • About
.nav-horizontal
horizontal nav example
  • Home
  • Portfolio
  • About
.nav-justified
justified nav example
  • Home
  • Portfolio
  • About 
<nav class="[modifier class]">
	<ul>
		<li>
			<a href="#">Home</a>
		</li>
		<li>
			<a href="#">Portfolio</a>
		</li>
		<li>
			<a href="#">About</a>
		</li>
	</ul>

7.8.1@mixin nav #permalink

sets default nav styling

7.8.2@mixin nav-horizontal #permalink

makes all nav items (in a ul) display horizontally with some default padding

7.8.3@mixin nav-justified #permalink

  • \$padding
    padding to add to left and right of li

makes a nav item (in a ul) display stretched across the page, filling all spaces in the ul

7.9@mixin sidebar #permalink

  • $float
    which side of the parent element to float the sidebar to < left | right >

creates a sidebar section with some useful defaults

7.10@mixin text-headline #permalink

emphasizes text by adding quotations and some default displays to make it pop

7.11@mixin top-image #permalink

places an image at the top of the page -> a kind of badass header
